definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Calcuations are made according to the methods used in metamorphic petrology.
sentences.chinese: 然後按變質岩石學中所採用的計算方法進行演算。

sentences.english: The metamorphic petrology of eclogites from northern Dabie Mountains was performed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了大別山北部榴輝巖的變質岩岩石學。

sentences.english: This experiment provides the basis for ihe solution of some petrological and mineralogical problems.
sentences.chinese: 本次實驗澄清了一些長期爭論的岩石學和礦物學問題。

sentences.english: Organic petrology is an important method for studying coal formed oil.
sentences.chinese: 有機岩石學方法是研究煤成油的重要方法之一。

sentences.english: The authors also discuss the regional tectonomagmatism activity from igneous petrologic angles.
sentences.chinese: 首次從岩石學的角度探討了區域構造岩漿活動史。

sentences.english: The petrology feature and reservoir property of fanglomerate are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對扇礫岩儲層岩石學特徵及物性特徵進行了分析。

sentences.english: Seismic petrology research includes micro-level and macro-level.
sentences.chinese: 地震岩石學研究分爲微觀和宏觀兩個層面。
